scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && go build -o ../bin/server cmd/server/main.go
scripts.test: cd backend && go test ./... -v -race && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.sync: git pull origin main && cd frontend && npm ci && cd .. && cd backend && go mod tidy && cd ..
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q bin 2>nul && cd frontend && rmdir /s /q dist 2>nul && cd ..
